title: Item Entity Schema
description: Defines the structure for an Item entity in the adventure game platform. Items are entities composed of components, extending the base entity schema.

components.description: Components defining the item's properties. Must include Name and Item components.

Name.description: The display name of the item.

Description.description: Optional textual description shown when examining the item.

Item.description: Core component marking this entity as an item and defining basic properties like tags.

Usable.description: Optional component defining direct use effects (like drinking a potion).

Equippable.description: Optional component defining if and how the item can be equipped.

DescriptionComponent.description: Provides a textual description of the item.

text.description: The text displayed when the item is examined (e.g., 'A heavy, rusted iron key.', 'A swirling red liquid in a vial.').

ItemComponent.description: Core component identifying an entity as an item and providing fundamental properties.

tags.description: List of keywords identifying the item's type, material, or purpose (e.g., 'key', 'potion', 'consumable', 'metal', 'quest_item'). Used by game systems for identification and filtering.

items.description: A tag string (lowercase, alphanumeric, underscores, hyphens).

value.description: Optional base monetary or point value of the item.

UsableComponent.description: Defines the effect when the item is used directly (typically targeting the user). Not all items have this component.

effect_type.description: Categorizes the primary effect of using the item. Defines which fields in 'effect_details' are relevant.

effect_details.description: Contains parameters specific to the chosen 'effect_type'.

amount.description: The amount of health points to restore (used if effect_type is 'heal').

event_name.description: The name of the event to trigger/publish via the event bus (used if effect_type is 'event').

event_data.description: Optional arbitrary data payload to include with the triggered event.

consumable.description: Is the item consumed (removed from inventory) after successful use?

use_message.description: Optional message displayed to the player upon successful use (e.g., 'You drink the potion and feel refreshed.'). If omitted, the consuming system might generate a default message based on effect type.

EquippableComponent.description: Component defining an item's ability to be equipped, the slot it uses, and effects it grants.

slotId.description: The ID of the equipment slot this item occupies (e.g., 'core:slot_main_hand').

equipEffects.description: Effects applied to the wearer when this item is equipped.

stat.description: The ID of the stat to modify (e.g., 'core:attr_strength'). Required if type is 'stat_mod'.

value.description: The amount to modify the stat by (can be negative). Required if type is 'stat_mod'.
